title: The Claus Family
writer: Ruben Vandenborre, Elke de Gezelle, Matthias Temmermans
short_cast: Jan Decleir, Mo Bakker, Bracha van Doesburgh, Renée Soutendijk, Amber Metdepenningen, Stefaan Degand, Eva van der Gucht, Janne Desmet, Josje Huisman, Wim Willaert, Pommelien Thijs, Sien Eggers, Rashif El Kaoui, Carly Wijs
cast: Jan Decleir, Mo Bakker, Bracha van Doesburgh, Renée Soutendijk, Amber Metdepenningen, Stefaan Degand, Eva van der Gucht, Janne Desmet, Josje Huisman, Wim Willaert, Pommelien Thijs, Sien Eggers, Rashif El Kaoui, Carly Wijs

desc: When his grandfather suddenly falls ill, holiday-hating Jules learns of his family's magical legacy and realizes he's the only hope to save Christmas.
